sentence.Network_en: He looked at her watch. "Christ! We only have three minutes!"

sentence.Network_en: Christ! Look at the time—I'm late!
sentence.Network_cn: 天哪！看看时间，我迟到了！

entry.def: Christ is one of the names of Jesus, whom Christians believe to be the son of God and whose teachings are the basis of Christianity.

entry.tran: (表示震惊、生气等，或加强语气，可能具冒犯意味)天哪！
entry.def: Some people say 'Christ!' when they are surprised, shocked, or annoyed, or in order to emphasize what they are saying. This use could cause offence.

example.ex: He looked at her watch. 'Christ! We only have three minutes!'
example.tran: 他看了看她的表：“天哪！我们仅剩3分钟了！”
